body.name: Gildan Women's Heavy Cotton T-Shirt, Style G5000L, 2-Pack
features: Antique colors & Sport Grey is 90/10 cotton/polyester
Dark Heather, Graphite Heather, Heather colors, & Sunset are 50/50 cotton/polyester
body.description: The Gildan Women’s Heavy Cotton T-Shirt is a go-to style for any female who wants to enhance her wardrobe with a basic that works with so many pieces. What makes it distinctly feminine is the semi-fitted, side-seamed silhouette combined with a narrow rib knit collar without top stitching. Decorate this versatile surface with screen printing, embroidery, iron-on transfers, bleaching or tie dye to enhance its appeal. Create a design collection by choosing companion styles for men, youth and toddlers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2021
Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I’m 5’6”, 180 lbs, Pear shaped, I ordered the 2XL
reviews.reviewText: I can verify that these are definitely 100% cotton t-shirts, so they are cooler than the polyester blends. They WILL shrink some in the wash. If you separate colors in the wash, then you’ll be able to order any color offered. If you don’t separate colors in the wash (like me!) then don’t order the yellow or white which will turn grey, and don’t order any oranges, pinks, reds, yellows, or bright greens because they will bleed color in your laundry. I chose to purchase two of these shirts, light blue and dark blue, in the 2XL size. I probably ought to have ordered them in my regular XL size, or maybe even down to a large for a snug fit. However because of my overall “pear” shape, carrying all my weight in my belly, I do like some extra room. I figure these will certainly shrink down a bit in the wash. I will probably be back to order more of these tees. These t-shirts are very well made. There’s quality double-stitching everywhere. I’m really unsure what they mean by “heavy cotton” in the product description. These are cotton knit shirts. I have 100% cotton bed sheets, and I guess these shirts are maybe about as heavy as those. In other words, these shirts are lightweight but not see through. I’ll still wear a lightweight (zipper front) 100% cotton sports bra underneath though when I exercise in public. These shirts are made in Honduras. The tags are written tiny and I have a hard time reading their actual wash instructions- but it looks like they want you to wash & dry cold, delicate/low spin, to help keep them from shrinking. Turning them inside out before washing will also help preserve their color and their lifespan. Ok everyone! These are great shirts, cool, and comfortable. I hope this review might help your decisions.

reviews.reviewText: These T-shirts are good quality , good fit and what I was looking for to wear under cardigans and dusters for the fall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Workhorse of a shirt.
reviews.reviewText: This is definitely 100% cotton, which was what I was looking for. However, it is slightly rough… A bit on the scratchy side I would say. I have been looking for a scoopneck 100% cotton T, and this neckline is a little high for me. But it does work well. There is a nice weight to this shirt. Not too light.

reviews.reviewText: Comfortable shirts good quality would buy again
Buena relación calidad - precio. No se encogieron con el tiempo.

reviews.reviewTitle: Love the quality and value for it.
reviews.reviewText: Great shirt. Sturdy cotton not the softest but I find this black shirt comfortable. I like the fabric cuz 100% cotton(solid colours). The fabric stretches taking the shape of your body and it’s movements. It became a bit more loose where I wanted the shirt more loose by stretching to my body shape and stretching by body movements over time. I ordered XXL and am currently six feet tall and like 263lbs. I think the scoop neck is more like a crew scoop neck with a small scoop. I love it. The sleeves are short like ladies length shirt sleeves shorter than men’s and well above the elbows. I ordered more in red:) I like the length of the torso as well.

Yo ya había pedido otras playeras de esta marca en color gris y azul y me gustaron mucho decidí perdirlas en este color rosa y me encantaron. El color es super bonito.Estas son de algodón 100% y es grueso, se siente de buena calidad.(creo que dependiendo del color la tela puede tener un cierto porcentaje de poliéster entonces hay que tener esto en cuenta y checar bien antes de pedir)
Bought for my mum. Ordered a size bigger for comfort. Material not very soft but acceptable (according to her).Much cheaper than buying from M&S in SG.
